title: Ep  432 | Phil Rants About Humanity Gone Rogue & Jase Shares a Biblical Guideline for Judgment
description:
Phil lets out a rant about the state of the modern world, comparing it to the rogue humanity of biblical times. Jase defines love in action for believers and shines some light on the topic of judgment against your brothers and sisters in Christ. Phil calls the inspired word of God a light that shines in darkest places, and Jase explains why love is never self-seeking. Phil and Al discuss how love can never delight in evil, and Jase describes the differences between worldly behavior and grace-motivated behavior.
